item.title: My first static website on Google Cloud Platform using Terraform
item.description:
Architecture üèó

Hey!üëã I am Dominik and this project is a Terraform configuration that creates a static website on Google Cloud Platform.‚òÅ The website is my personal portfolio and is hosted on a Cloud Storage bucket. The website is served using an HTTPS load balancer, which provides SSL termination. This ensures that all traffic to the website is secure and encrypted. The website is accessible at www.domssocial.co.uk.

The project also creates a DNS zone for the website, which is used to route traffic to the load balancer. And the Cloud CDN is used to cache the website content and improve performance.
